name: GDG BANDJOUN MOBILE SITES CERTIFICATION STUDY JAM 2018
description:
• What we'll do
Study Jams are a great opportunity to bring Developers and students of Bandjoun Region to learn about Web Mobile Sites development in order to give to them a great mobile web skills that can be used for their personal development or career advancement.

• What to bring
Students have to come each with a laptop.

• Important to know
Mobile now accounts for over half of all web traffic. Users expect their small-screen experiences to be as quick and intuitive as those on the desktop. But making the mobile web fast and easy takes some special skills. 53% of mobile visitors will leave if a page takes more than three seconds to load. The average page takes 22 seconds to load, so collectively we're losing a lot of mobile users and giving them a bad experience along the way.

name: GDG BANDJOUN CLOUD STUDY JAM 2018
description:
• What we'll do
Study Jams are a great opportunity to bring students of Bandjoun Region to learn about all IT hosted by Google Cloud in order to give to them a specific skill that can be used for their personal development or career advancement

• What to bring
Students have to come each with a laptop.

• Important to know
- Learn how to set up development and production environments in the Cloud.
- Learn how Docker and Kubernetes work, or learn how to process Big Data in the Cloud.
- Get access to Qwiklabs.com, a Google training tool, free of charge (a $70+ value).
- Get Google-hosted badges likethis for their online profiles, to show potential employers what they know about Cloud computing.

name: Cloud Study Jams
description:
Participer au Cloud Study Jams, vous permettra:

1. Apprendre à configurer des environnements de développement et de production dans le cloud.
2. Découvrir comment Docker et Kubernetes fonctionnent ou comment traiter les Big Data dans le cloud.
3. Obtenir des codes d'accès à Qwiklabs.com, un outil de formation de Google.
4. Obtenir des badges hébergés sur Google pour les profils en ligne des participants
